languages.text: "Нет. Скорее — приглашение в нее. И даже если мои сородичи решили поживиться на твоем корабле, попав на него таким незамысловатым способом... ты что, боишься их, {name}?" {n}Последняя фраза полнится ядовитой издевкой.{/n} "Напрасно. По крайней мере мы развеем скуку, царящую на борту этого монкайского ведра".

traits.locale_text: "Нет. Скорее — приглашение в нее. И даже если мои сородичи решили поживиться на твоем корабле, попав на него таким незамысловатым способом... ты что, боишься их, {name}?" {n}Последняя фраза полнится ядовитой издевкой.{/n} "Напрасно. По крайней мере мы развеем скуку, царящую на борту этого монкайского ведра".

languages.text: "No, but it is likely to be an invitation to walk into one. And even if my kin decided to prey on your ship by boarding it in such a pathetic manner... Are you that afraid of them, {name}?" {n}The last phrase is dripping with scorn.{/n} "You should not be. If nothing else, this will alleviate the boredom on board this mon-keigh rust bucket."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Скорее — приглашение в нее. И даже если мои сородичи решили поживиться на твоем корабле, попав на него таким незамысловатым способом... ты что, боишься их, {name}?" {n}Последняя фраза полнится ядовитой издевкой.{/n} "Напрасно. По крайней мере мы развеем скуку, царящую на борту этого монкайского ведра".

traits.locale_text: "No, but it is likely to be an invitation to walk into one. And even if my kin decided to prey on your ship by boarding it in such an pathetic manner.... Are you that afraid of them, {name}?" {n}The last phrase is dripping with scorn.{/n} "You should not be. If nothing else, this will alleviate the boredom inside this glorified mon-keigh rust bucket."

Are you that afraid of them, {name}?" {n}The last phrase is dripping with scorn.{/n} "You should not be. If nothing else, this will alleviate the boredom on board this mon-keigh rust bucket."

languages.text: "Nein, aber es ist vermutlich eine Einladung, in eine hineinzuspazieren. Und selbst, wenn meine Verwandten entschieden haben sollten, Euer Schiff auf solch erbärmliche Weise zu entern ... Habt Ihr denn so große Angst vor ihnen, {name}?" {n}Der letzte Satz trieft nur so vor Verachtung.{/n} "Das solltet Ihr nicht. Zumindest wird das die Langeweile auf diesem Chem-Pan-Sey-Rostkübel ein wenig lindern."
languages.original_text: "No, but it is likely to be an invitation to walk into one. And even if my kin decided to prey on your ship by boarding it in such a pathetic manner... Are you that afraid of them, {name}?" {n}The last phrase is dripping with scorn.{/n} "You should not be. If nothing else, this will alleviate the boredom on board this mon-keigh rust bucket."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, aber es ist vermutlich eine Einladung, in eine hineinzuspazieren. Und selbst, wenn meine Verwandten entschieden haben sollten, Euer Schiff auf solch erbärmliche Weise zu entern ... Habt Ihr denn so große Angst vor ihnen, {name}?" {n}Der letzte Satz trieft nur so vor Verachtung.{/n} "Das solltet Ihr nicht. Zumindest wird das die Langeweile auf diesem Chem-Pan-Sey-Rostkübel ein wenig lindern."

languages.text: “我不这么想，至少这件事情不像是陷阱本身，更像是邀请你踏入陷阱。就算我的族人真的打算用这么丢人的手段跑到船上，烧杀抢掠……你就那么怕他们吗，{name}？”{n}玛拉斋最后这句话充满了轻蔑之意。{/n}“最起码，这群人能让这个猴子的破铁桶没那么无聊。”
languages.original_text: "No, but it is likely to be an invitation to walk into one. And even if my kin decided to prey on your ship by boarding it in such a pathetic manner... Are you that afraid of them, {name}?" {n}The last phrase is dripping with scorn.{/n} "You should not be. If nothing else, this will alleviate the boredom on board this mon-keigh rust bucket."

traits.locale_text: “我不这么想，至少这件事情不像是陷阱本身，更像是邀请你踏入陷阱。就算我的族人真的打算用这么丢人的手段跑到船上，烧杀抢掠……你就那么怕他们吗，{name}？”{n}玛拉斋最后这句话充满了轻蔑之意。{/n}“最起码，这群人能让这个猴子的破铁桶没那么无聊。”

languages.text: « Non, je ne pense pas... Pas encore, du moins. Et quand bien même ils se lanceraient dans une risible tentative de capturer votre vaisseau... Vous effraient-ils à ce point, {name} ? » {n}Sa dernière remarque transpire le mépris.{/n} « Ne craignez rien. Au strict minimum, ils serviront de divertissement contre l'ennui mortel qui règne à bord de ce tas de ferraille mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "No, but it is likely to be an invitation to walk into one. And even if my kin decided to prey on your ship by boarding it in such a pathetic manner... Are you that afraid of them, {name}?" {n}The last phrase is dripping with scorn.{/n} "You should not be. If nothing else, this will alleviate the boredom on board this mon-keigh rust bucket."

traits.locale_text: « Non, je ne pense pas... Pas encore, du moins. Et quand bien même ils se lanceraient dans une risible tentative de capturer votre vaisseau... Vous effraient-ils à ce point, {name} ? » {n}Sa dernière remarque transpire le mépris.{/n} « Ne craignez rien. Au strict minimum, ils serviront de divertissement contre l'ennui mortel qui règne à bord de ce tas de ferraille mon-keigh. »

languages.text: «No, pero probablemente quieran invitarnos a una. Además, aunque mi gente decidiera abordar tu nave de forma tan lamentable... ¿tanto miedo les tienes, {name}?». {n}La última frase rezuma desprecio.{/n} «No deberías. En el peor de los casos, por lo menos aliviaremos el aburrimiento de esta bañera mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "No, but it is likely to be an invitation to walk into one. And even if my kin decided to prey on your ship by boarding it in such a pathetic manner... Are you that afraid of them, {name}?" {n}The last phrase is dripping with scorn.{/n} "You should not be. If nothing else, this will alleviate the boredom on board this mon-keigh rust bucket."

traits.locale_text: «No, pero probablemente quieran invitarnos a una. Además, aunque mi gente decidiera abordar tu nave de forma tan lamentable... ¿tanto miedo les tienes, {name}?». {n}La última frase rezuma desprecio.{/n} «No deberías. En el peor de los casos, por lo menos aliviaremos el aburrimiento de esta bañera mon-keigh».

languages.text: 「いいや。だが、どうやら踏み込んでこいってお招きらしい。仮に奴らが無作法にお前の船に乗り込んで暴れることに決めたとして、それほど奴らを恐れる必要があるか、{name}？」{n}最後の質問は嘲笑と共に投げられた。{/n}「違うよな？少なくともこのモン＝ケイのオンボロ船でのいい退屈凌ぎにはなるだろうよ」
languages.original_text: "No, but it is likely to be an invitation to walk into one. And even if my kin decided to prey on your ship by boarding it in such a pathetic manner... Are you that afraid of them, {name}?" {n}The last phrase is dripping with scorn.{/n} "You should not be. If nothing else, this will alleviate the boredom on board this mon-keigh rust bucket."

traits.locale_text: 「いいや。だが、どうやら踏み込んでこいってお招きらしい。仮に奴らが無作法にお前の船に乗り込んで暴れることに決めたとして、それほど奴らを恐れる必要があるか、{name}？」{n}最後の質問は嘲笑と共に投げられた。{/n}「違うよな？少なくともこのモン＝ケイのオンボロ船でのいい退屈凌ぎにはなるだろうよ」

languages.text: "Hayır ama muhtemelen bizi tuzağa düşeceğimiz bir yere davet edecekler. Soydaşlarım gemine böyle zavallıca çıkarak herkesi avlamaya başlarsa da... Onlardan korkuyor musun {name}?" {n}Bu son sözleri, ağır bir aşağılama niyeti içeriyor.{/n} "Korkmamalısın. Hiç değilse bu mon-keigh külüstüründe canımızın sıkıntısı geçer."
languages.original_text: "No, but it is likely to be an invitation to walk into one. And even if my kin decided to prey on your ship by boarding it in such a pathetic manner... Are you that afraid of them, {name}?" {n}The last phrase is dripping with scorn.{/n} "You should not be. If nothing else, this will alleviate the boredom on board this mon-keigh rust bucket."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır ama bizi muhtemelen tuzağa düşeceğimiz bir yere davet edecekler. Soydaşlarım gemine böyle ezikçe bir çıkartma yapıp herkesi avlamaya başlarlarsa da... Onlardan korkuyor musun {name}?" {n}Bu son sözleri, ağır bir hor görme kokuyor.{/n} "Korkmamalısın. Hiç değilse bu mon-keigh pas kovasının içindeki sıkıcılığı biraz gidermiş olurlar."
